action.msg: I thought I asked you 'kind' folks to stop bothering me. I can hardly understand a lick of what you guys are saying.
action.narrate: How long have I been here?

action.msg: I can't even remember the reason why you guys locked me up.
You do realize tomorrow's your trial right?.
Then again, I wouldn't be surprised if you've lost count of time in here, everyone does...
I can promise you, there's a much worse place than hell waiting for you.
Whatever. It's probably better than being in your shoes right now!
Bahaha! Have fun rotting till tomorrow!
Hey, wake up!
Huh? What?-
You were having another nightmare. Let me guess, dark void again?
Oh, yeah. Pretty much.
Thanks for waking me, babe.
Uh, where was I?
Oh no, you're heading to bed. This paperwork of yours can wait.
No no, I should finish this work. Keeping this shit piled up will annoy me.
What, so you can drool on those papers some more? After the first three times, it's less cute y'know.
Hrmm... you're right. Fine, let's end the night early.
I still wish you'd tell me more on what's bugging you.
I will, soon. Sorry, it's just a little hard to put into words...
Well, I can think of a way we can help you relax.
Oh yeah? It's been a while since we've done this...
